name: The Curse of Lavender Town
description:
I liked to do games since 2016 until 2020 when i stopped for many sad moments and the covid period, etc...

The other ones were not so good so i removed them.

But now in 2023, i worked on this project!

A new game, my first Pokemon creepy game, and it's name is The Curse of Lavender Town!

Plot:

- A boy named Jack, born and living in Lavender Town, will investigate on the strange paranormal activities in that place.

And he will come across something bigger than him... -

This is not exactly my first game, it's my second try of doing a Pokemon game.

The first one, i abandoned it and i don't want to consider it so much, so yes!

This is my first Pokemon Game! :D

The style of the game, without an exactly equal mechanism like the original Pokemon games is because thev program i use is for games in 2d, but not exactly for Pokemon ones, but anyways, is not so bad, the game is not so bad too i think, and i will continue to use this kind of style for all the games! :)
